short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: get all the news related to Africa with one simple click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: this extension allows people to access quickly all types of news related to africa. It makes the users's lives easier since they don't have to go look for the articles themselves
